author: Aakash Jhaveri
title: Airtel extends pre-paid plan validity to April 17 for all customers
description: Airtel is extending the validity of all prepaid packs to April 17 along with additional talktime of Rs 10.
content:
Amid a state of panic and chaos, Airtel is extending the validity of its plans and providing free talktime, in hopes of not adding to peoples woes.
Bharti Airtel has announced that more than 80 million prepaid users will get an extension in the validity peri… [+1320 chars]
